settings.subtitle: YOUR PERIOD HEALTH RESULTS ARE IN
settings.title: Hey beautiful,
You have so much more power over how you experience your periods! Are you ready for massive transformation?
Here’s your solution for your personal cycle goals
settings.desc: Start enjoying happier & healthier periods each month!

settings.comment: “Joined Moonbox in the hope of regulating my hormones/cycle to aid in ovulation and to learn how to support my cycle in healthier ways – not just for myself, but for my daughter. Happy to report that not only did my cycle come back a lot less paintful but I have also gotten pregnant! Moonbox has been a life changer and a game changer.”
settings.name: Chloe
